org.apache.batik.parser
Interface UnitProcessor.Context

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSVGLength.DefaultContext, SVGOMElement.UnitContext, UnitProcessor.DefaultContext
Enclosing class:
UnitProcessor
public static interface UnitProcessor.Context

Holds the informations needed to compute the units.

Method Summary

          Returns the element.
 float getFontSize()
          Returns the font-size value.
 float getPixelToMM()
          Returns the size of a px CSS unit in millimeters.

          Returns the size of a px CSS unit in millimeters.
 float getViewportHeight()
          Returns the viewport height used to compute units.

          Returns the viewport width used to compute units.
 float getXHeight()
          Returns the x-height value.
